generic.type: {label} must be of type {expectedType}, but was {actualType}
generic.primitive: {label} must be a primitive value, but was {actualType}

object.notInstanceOf: {label} is not an instance of the required constructor
object.tooDeep: {label} is too deep. Maximum depth: {maxDepth}, actual depth: {actualDepth}
object.notDeepEnough: {label} is not deep enough. Minimum depth: {minDepth}, actual depth: {actualDepth}
object.notDepth: {label} must be exactly {depth} levels deep. Actual depth: {actualDepth}
object.tooManyKeys: {label} has too many keys. Maximum: {maxKeyCount}, actual: {actualKeyCount}
object.tooManyRecursiveKeys: {label} has too many recursive keys. Maximum: {maxKeyCount}, actual: {actualKeyCount}
object.tooFewKeys: {label} has too few keys. Minimum: {minKeyCount}, actual: {actualKeyCount}
object.tooFewRecursiveKeys: {label} has too few recursive keys. Minimum: {minKeyCount}, actual: {actualKeyCount}
object.noneOfPaths: {label} cannot contain any of these paths: {paths}
object.missingPath: {label} must contain at least one of these paths: {paths}
object.pathsOtherThan: {label} contains paths that are not allowed: {paths}
object.xOfPaths: {label} must contain exactly {count} of these paths: {paths}
object.allOfButOneOfPaths: {label} must contain all but {count} of these paths: {paths}
object.maxDepth: {label} must be less than {count} levels deep
object.minDepth: {label} must be more than {count} levels deep
object.allOfKeys: {label} must contain all of these fields: {fields}
object.someOfKeys: {label} must contain some of these fields: {fields}
object.noneOfKeys: {label} cannot contain any of these fields: {fields}
object.oneOfKeys: {label} must contain exactly one of these fields: {fields}
object.allButOneOfKeys: {label} must contain all but one of these fields: {fields}

array.allOf: {label} must contain all of these values: {requiredValues}. Missing: {missingValue}
array.noneOf: {label} cannot contain any of these values: {forbiddenValues}. Found {invalidValue} at index {index}
array.someOf: {label} must contain at least one of these values: {possibleValues}
array.tuple: {label} must match the tuple values: {tupleValues}. Expected {expectedValue} at index {index}, but found {invalidValue}

exactly.missingValue: {label} must contain exactly these values: {requiredValues}. Missing: {missingValue}

array.only: {label} can only contain values from: {allowedValues}. Invalid value {invalidValue} found at index {index}
array.otherThan: {label} cannot contain any of these values: {forbiddenValues}. Found {invalidValue} at index {index}
array.unique: {label} must contain only unique values. Duplicate value {duplicateValue} found at indices {index1} and {index2}
array.length: {label} must have a length of {requiredLength}. Current length: {length}
array.lengthBetween: {label} must have a length.isBetween {min} and {max}. Current length: {length}
array.maxLength: {label} contains more than {max} items. Current length: {length}
array.minLength: {label} contains less than {min} items. Current length: {length}

number.invalidDecimalPlaces: {label} must have.isBetween {minDecimalPlaces} and {maxDecimalPlaces} decimal places. Found {numDecimalPlaces}
number.isLessThanOrEqual: {label} must be less than or equal to {comparison}
number.isGreaterThanOrEqual: {label} must be greater than or equal to {comparison}
number.isSigned: {label} must have a positive or negative sign

string.minLength: {label} must have a minimum length of {min}
string.maxLength: {label} must have a maximum length of {max}
string.isDomain: {label} must be a valid domain name
string.isLabel: {label} must be a valid label (1-63 chars, alphanumeric and hyphens, no leading/trailing hyphens)
string.isPath: {label} must be a valid file path
string.isDataUri: {label} must be a valid data URI
string.isIpV4: {label} must be a valid IPv4 address
string.ipV6: {label} must be a valid IPv6 address
string.isIp: {label} must be a valid IP address (IPv4 or IPv6)
string.isAlphanumeric: {label} must contain only letters and numbers
string.isBinary: {label} must contain only binary digits (0 and 1)
string.isHex: {label} must be a valid hexadecimal string
string.isHexColor: {label} must be a valid hex color code
string.isBmp: {label} must contain only Basic Multilingual Plane characters
string.isBase64: {label} must be a valid Base64 encoded string
string.isRepetition: {label} must be a repetition of '{fragment}'.isBetween {min} and {max} times
string.isEmail: {label} must be a valid email address
string.isE164: {label} must be a valid E164 phone number format
string.isPhone: {label} must be a valid phone number
string.isIpCidrV4: {label} must be a valid IPv4 CIDR notation
string.isIpCidrV6: {label} must be a valid IPv6 CIDR notation
string.isIpCidr: {label} must be a valid IP CIDR notation
string.isSsn: {label} must be a valid Social Security Number

isNumeric.base: {label} must be a valid numeric string

string.isMoney: {label} must be a valid monetary amount
string.isMeasurement: {label} must be a valid measurement with units
string.isSlug: {label} must be a valid slug (lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens)
string.isJwt: {label} must be a valid JWT token

isComplex.base: {label} must meet complexity requirements (length: {minLen}-{maxLen}, uppercase: {minUppercase}+, lowercase: {minLowercase}+, digits: {minDigits}+, special chars: {minSpecialChars}+)
isComplex.insufficientUppercase: {label} must contain at least {minUppercase} uppercase letter(s)
isComplex.insufficientLowercase: {label} must contain at least {minLowercase} lowercase letter(s)
isComplex.insufficientSpecialChars: {label} must contain at least {minSpecialChars} special character(s)
isComplex.excessiveRepetition: {label} cannot have more than {maxRepeats} consecutive identical characters

string.isCreditCard: {label} must be a valid credit card number
string.isImei: {label} must be a valid IMEI number
string.isMac: {label} must be a valid MAC address
string.isGtin: {label} must be a valid GTIN (Global Trade Item Number)
string.isCurrencyCode: {label} must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code
string.isState: {label} must be a valid US state abbreviation

isZip.base: {label} must be a valid ZIP code

date.iso: {label} must be a valid ISO 8601 date format
date.ISOOptionsCompliance: {label} does not meet the required ISO date options
date.ISOBasicFormat: {label} must use extended ISO format (not basic format)
date.isGeneric: {label} must be a valid date in the specified format
date.GenericOptionsCompliance: {label} does not meet the required date format options
date.isoWeek: {label} must be a valid ISO week date format (YYYY-Www or YYYY-Www-D)
date.isoOrdinal: {label} must be a valid ISO ordinal date format (YYYY-DDD)
date.timestamp: {label} must be a valid timestamp (integer representing milliseconds since epoch)
date.leapYear: {label} must be a date in a leap year
date.dayOfWeek: {label} must be on day {dayOfWeek} of the week (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday)
